original_title: Muse: Live at Teatro Gran Rex 2008
overview: Performed 24th July 2008  This was the last known performance of Apocalypse Please until 2015, at Webster Hall, in New York.  Space Dementia was not on the original setlist. This song was played after that a man in the crowd had shouted "Space Dementia !".  Invincible was played half a step down.
title: Muse: Live at Teatro Gran Rex 2008
